languages.text: {n}Соломон усмехается.{/n} "Блестящее суждение. Что-то я забыл, что {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}вы собирали подать{/d} с не меньшего числа миров, чем я. У меня нет твердой гипотезы, зачем губернатор задерживает нас, но есть план: не будем выдавать своей осведомленности, пока не появится шанс для успешной атаки — мы на чужой территории, так что действовать надо внезапно и наверняка. Теперь договоримся об условном сигнале".

{n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙笑了起来。{/n}“非常专业的意见。我差点忘了，你以前也和我一样，去过许多世界{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}征收什一税{/d}。至于那个总督为什么打算拖延时间，我目前还没有合适的猜测，但我有个想法。我们可以假装蒙在鼓里，耐心等待合适的机会。我们对这颗行星的了解不多，因此如果要采取行动的话，动作必须要快，而且不能冒险。我们可以先决定一下，等时机到来的时候，采取行动的暗号是什么。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙笑了起来。{/n}“非常专业的意见。我差点忘了，你以前也和我一样，去过许多世界{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}征收什一税{/d}。至于那个总督为什么打算拖延时间，我目前还没有合适的猜测，但我有个想法。我们可以假装蒙在鼓里，耐心等待合适的机会。我们对这颗行星的了解不多，因此如果要采取行动的话，动作必须要快，而且不能冒险。我们可以先决定一下，等时机到来的时候，采取行动的暗号是什么。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは笑う。{/n}「見事な指摘です。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたが徴税した{/d}惑星の数が、私と同じくらいだということをうっかり忘れました。総督が私たちを足止めしている理由についてははっきり分かりませんが、一つ計画を提案しようと思います。相手の策略に気づいていることを悟られずに、攻撃の好機を待ちましょう。私たちは土地勘がないので、隙を与える前に、電光石火の如く素早く動く必要があります。では、その時の合図を決めましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは笑う。{/n}「見事な指摘です。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたが徴税した{/d}惑星の数が、私と同じくらいだということをうっかり忘れました。総督が私たちを足止めしている理由についてははっきり分かりませんが、一つ計画を提案しようと思います。相手の策略に気づいていることを悟られずに、攻撃の好機を待ちましょう。私たちは土地勘がないので、隙を与える前に、電光石火の如く素早く動く必要があります。では、その時の合図を決めましょう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se ríe.{/n} «Un apunte experto. Se me ha debido de olvidar que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}usted obtenía tributos{/d} de tantos mundos como yo, en su época. No tengo una hipótesis firme para la espera a la que nos somete el gobernador, pero quiero proponer un plan: ocultemos que somos conscientes de su treta y esperemos al momento oportuno para golpear. No conocemos el territorio, por lo que deberíamos actuar sin previo aviso y sin riesgos. Decidamos una señal para indicar que es la hora».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."

No tengo una hipótesis firme para la espera a la que nos somete el gobernador, pero quiero proponer un plan: ocultemos que somos conscientes de su treta y esperemos al momento oportuno para golpear. No conocemos el territorio, por lo que deberíamos actuar sin previo aviso y sin riesgos. Decidamos una señal para indicar que es la hora».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kichert.{/n} "Ausgezeichnet erkannt. Mir war kurzzeitig entfallen, dass Ihr früher auf ebenso vielen Welten wie ich {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Tribute eingetrieben{/d} habt. Ich habe keine gute Hypothese für die Verzögerung durch den Gouverneur, aber ich möchte einen Plan vorschlagen: Wir sollten nicht durchblicken lassen, dass wir ihn durchschaut haben, und auf eine Gelegenheit zum Zuschlagen warten – wir kennen das Territorium nicht, also sollten wir plötzlich aktiv werden und kein Risiko eingehen. Und nun lasst uns entscheiden, wie zum rechten Zeitpunkt unser Signal lauten soll."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kichert.{/n} "Ausgezeichnet erkannt. Mir war kurzzeitig entfallen, dass Ihr früher auf ebenso vielen Welten wie ich {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Tribute eingetrieben{/d} habt. Ich habe keine gute Hypothese für die Verzögerung durch den Gouverneur, aber ich möchte einen Plan vorschlagen: Wir sollten nicht durchblicken lassen, dass wir ihn durchschaut haben, und auf eine Gelegenheit zum Zuschlagen warten – wir kennen das Territorium nicht, also sollten wir plötzlich aktiv werden und kein Risiko eingehen. Und nun lasst uns entscheiden, wie zum rechten Zeitpunkt unser Signal lauten soll."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Ustaca bir tespit. Senin de benim kadar çok dünyadan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}aşar topladığını{/d} unutmuşum. Valinin neden bizi oyaladığına dair güçlü bir hipotezim yok ancak kendisinin oyununu fark ettiğimizi belli etmeden saldırmak için uygun anı bekleyelim derim. Tanımadığımız bir bölgedeyiz, dolayısıyla risk almamalı ve hızlıca harekete geçmeliyiz. ­­Şimdiyse vakit geldiğini zaman kullanacağımız sinyali kararlaştıralım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kıkırdar.{/n} "Ustaca bir tespit. Senin de benim kadar çok dünyadan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}aşar topladığını{/d} unutmuşum. Valinin neden bizi oyaladığına dair güçlü bir hipotezim yok ancak kendisinin oyununu fark ettiğimizi belli etmeden saldırmak için uygun anı bekleyelim derim. Tanımadığımız bir bölgedeyiz, dolayısıyla risk almamalı ve hızlıca harekete geçmeliyiz. ­­Şimdiyse vakit geldiğini zaman kullanacağımız sinyali kararlaştıralım."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ricane.{/n} « Finement observé. J'avais oublié que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}vous aviez collecté les tributs{/d} d'autant de mondes que moi-même. Si j'ignore pourquoi exactement le gouverneur cherche à nous mettre des bâtons dans les roues, j'ai un plan à vous proposer : faisons mine d'être dupes de son manège et guettons le moment propice pour frapper. Nous sommes ici en territoire inconnu, aussi nous faut-il agir par surprise et ne rien laisser au hasard. Convenons donc d'un signal à utiliser le moment venu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne chuckles.{/n} "Expertly noted. It somehow slipped my mind that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}you collected tributes{/d} from just as many worlds as I have in your time. I do not have a strong hypothesis for why the governor is stalling us, but I would like to propose a plan: let's not give away the fact that we are aware of his ploy and wait for an opportune moment to strike — we do not know the territory, so we should act suddenly and take no chances. Now let's decide on a signal we will use when the time is right."
